meanings.definition: A person or company that supplies goods to stores and other businesses for sale to consumers.
meanings.sent1: The distributors delivered fresh fruits to the local market.
meanings.sent2: The distributors shipped new books to the bookstore.
meanings.sent3: The distributors accidentally sent a crate of bananas to the library instead of the grocery store.
meanings.sent4: The distributors acted like busy bees, buzzing from one store to another.
meanings.sent5: The distributors were like Santa Claus, bringing joy to all the shops.

meanings.definition: A device in a vehicle's ignition system that distributes high voltage to the spark plugs.
meanings.sent1: The distributors in the car ensure the spark plugs receive the right amount of electricity.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic checked the distributors to fix the engine issue.
meanings.sent3: The distributors in the car decided to throw a party for the spark plugs.
meanings.sent4: The distributors hummed like a symphony orchestra, conducting energy to the spark plugs.
meanings.sent5: The distributors were the conductors of power in the vehicle.

meanings.definition: A person or organization that distributes films or other media to theaters or retailers.
meanings.sent1: The film distributors brought the latest blockbuster to the cinema.
meanings.sent2: The distributors supplied the new video game to the store.
meanings.sent3: The distributors decided to host a movie night under the stars.
meanings.sent4: The distributors were like the messengers of entertainment, delivering joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The distributors made the movie magic happen behind the scenes.
